meanings.definition: A carbohydrate containing a small number of monosaccharide units.
meanings.sent1: An oligosaccharide is a simple sugar chain.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study oligosaccharides to understand their structure.
meanings.sent3: The oligosaccharide walked into the glucose party feeling short.
meanings.sent4: The oligosaccharide was like a tiny sweet necklace.
meanings.sent5: The oligosaccharide looked like a small sugar family holding hands.

meanings.definition: A type of sugar polymer consisting of 3-10 monosaccharide units.
meanings.sent1: This oligosaccharide has a few sugar building blocks.
meanings.sent2: Food labels often list oligosaccharides as ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The oligosaccharide trio performed a sweet harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as complex and sweet as an oligosaccharide.
meanings.sent5: The oligosaccharide chain resembled a sugary ladder.
